name: All Sequences
description: Every set is a sequence

name: Dragon Pong
description: Pong/Kong of any dragon

name: Round Wind
description: Pong/Kong of the current wind

name: Seat Wind
description: Pong/Kong of the player's wind.
notes: The dealer's seat is East, second player is South, third is West, and fourth is North.

name: Self Draw
description: Winning by drawing a tile from the wall
notes: This can be from the front or back of the wall.

name: Concealed Hand
description: Winning without showing any melds from the hand

name: Robbing the Kong
description: Winning off of another player's kong

name: Last Tile
description: Winning off the last tile in the game, drawn or discarded

name: Kong Replacement
description: Drawing the winning tile from a kong (does not stack with self-draw)

name: Replacement Self Draw
description: Drawing the winning tile from a kong or flower (does not stack with self-draw)

name: Double Kong Replacement
description: Drawing the winning tile from a kong immediately after a kong (does not stack with self-draw)
notes: In some rulesets, replacing with a flower does not count.

name: All Triplets
description: Hand is composed of all pongs or kongs

name: Mixed One Suit
description: A Hand composed of only honor tiles and tiles from one suit.
notes: This can be a mix of pongs, kongs, and chows.

name: All Pairs
description: Hand of 7 unique pairs, does not stack with concealed hand.
notes: Having four of the same tile is not a unique pair.

name: Pure One Suit
description: All tiles from a single suit.
notes: This can be a mix of pongs, kongs, and chows but cannot include honor tiles.

name: Lesser Dragons
description: Melds of 2 dragons and a pair of the 3rd dragon

name: Small Winds
description: Melds of 3 winds and a pair of the 4th wind

name: Greater Dragons
description: Melds of all 3 dragon tiles.

name: All Honors
description: A hand with only honor tiles.
notes: This does not stack with All Triplets because it is implied.

name: Four Great Winds
description: A hand with melds of all 4 winds.

name: Thirteen Orphans
description: One of each one, nine, wind, and dragon, and a 14th tile (any other terminal or honor tile)

name: All Kongs
description: Hand containing four Kongs and a pair.

name: Concealed Triplets
description: Hand containing four concealed (unmelded) triplets.
notes: The bonus can only be won by concealed self draw unless the discarded winning tile forms the pair, not any of the four melds.

name: All Terminals
description: Hand containing pongs or kongs of only one and nine tiles.

name: Nine Gates
description: Hand in any one suit consisting of exactly 1112345678999 and an extra tile of that suit.

name: Blessing of Heaven
description: Dealer wins with their starting hand.
notes: Does not stack with concealed hand.

name: Blessing of Earth
description: Player wins on the first discard.
notes: Does not stack with concealed hand.

name: Pure Straight
description: A hand using tiles 1-9 from any one suit, forming three consecutive sequences.

name: Pure Double
description: Two runs of the same suit and same numerical sequence.
notes: In some variations, this only scores if the hand is also concealed.

name: Mixed Triple Sequence
description: Three runs of the same numerical sequence, one in each suit.

name: Mixed Straight
description: A straight (tiles 1-9) formed by sequences from all three suits.
notes: The sequences must be exactly [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], and [7, 8, 9].

name: Outside Hand
description: A hand that includes Terminals and Honors in each set, including the pair.

name: Simple Hand
description: A hand formed without Terminal or Honor tiles.

name: Terminals and Honors
description: A hand entirely composed of Terminal and Honor tiles.

name: Knitted Straight
description: Hand with 147 258 369 of different suits, an additional meld, and a pair. 147, 258, and 369 count as chows for scoring.

name: Knitted Lesser Honors
description: 147 258 369 of different suits with honor tiles instead of melds and an eye. Honor tiles can replace parts of the straight.

name: Knitted Greater Honors
description: 147 258 369 of different suits with honor tiles instead of melds and an eye. Honor tiles can replace parts of the straight. Must have one of each honor to score this level.
